Adjustable Hood | Protective Zipper Flap: Two-way front zipper with protective flap cover
Two large vertical zip chest pockets

Specifications.Materials:
[outer] G-1000 Original: 65% polyester, 35% cotton 
[reinforcements] G-1000® HeavyDuty: 65% polyester, 35% cotton
